attributes.action: reconsider the Asylum and Immigration Tribunal to deport Watford FC Footballer Alhasan Bangura
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Al Bangura arrived in the UK as a 15 year old refugee after his Father was brutally murdered in the Sierra Leone Civil War.

In the last four years, he has established a life in the UK, become a professional football player and a father. He is a positive role model for many refugees and contributes much to society through a positive image of success.

We urge that the Government urgently reviews the status of Alhasan Bangura and grants him immediate UK citizenship.

rejection.details: Individual cases are a matter for direct correspondence with the Home Office.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
